snippet.title: Buggy - PlayStation Gameplay (Steam Re-release)
snippet.description:
Originally released in 1998 for the PS1, this radio-controlled car racing game offered players the thrill of RC racing in videogame form.

Known in the US as "Team Losi RC Racing", you race across 16 different tracks, take on time attack trials and devious challenge maps, unlock new cars, and discover exciting power-ups as you compete to become the ultimate Buggy champion!

The gameplay is from the Steam re-release from Pixel Games UK.
Buggy (C) Urbanscan

Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2289860/Buggy/

#steam #steamgame #steamgames #retrogames #retrogaming #pixelgamesuk #playstation #ps1 #psx #psone #gremlin #gremlininteractive #urbanscan #buggy #teamlosircracing

FUN FACT: This game was re-released on Steam twice. In 2015, a company called "Console Classics" released their own version of the emulated Steam port. The now-delisted 2015 port (which was sold for $5, by the way!) doesn't support local multiplayer, while Pixel Games UK's port does, as well as better configuration options, smoother and more responsive controls, smoother video and the music seems to cleaner and has better quality. As a matter of fact, the 2015 version was using PCSX-ReARMed, the open-source emulator that Sony Interactive Entertainment used for their "PlayStation Classic" mini console, while Pixel Games UK was using a different emulator. And by the way, both releases use the PAL version, as the NTSC version was published by Fox Interactive and was under the Team Losi license.
